summary: A sheep-rancher's son aspires to win a music conservatory scholarship, but to apply he needs musicians who can play his music. Circumstances lead him to form a band out of prison inmates.
cast: Luke Arnold|Alexa PenaVega|Rhys Wakefield|Timothy Hutton|Che Timmins|John Clark|Leo Taylor|Andy McPhee|George Kapiniaris|Ebony Ween|Luke O'Loughlin|Adam Groecke|Peter Lamb|Todd Telford|Hung Le|Maude Davey|Emma Rancie|Denis Noble|Roger Newcombe|Adam Morgan|Chrissie Page|Wayne Anthoney|John Doherty|Rob MacPherson|Andrea Nicolas|Alex Hart|Klayton Stainer|Nathan O'Keefe|Nicholas Cawthorn|Trevor Warner|Karl Pink|Robin Breugelmans|Cameron du Rieu|Kieran O'Dea|Matthre Lykos|Checc Musolino|Michael Moody|Dwight Adams|Daniel 'Doc' Richards|Chris Tseregounes|Oskar Pichler|Wayne Mattie|Darren Dawe|Colin Shearing|Tim Carter|Brendan Pearn|Briohny Campbell|Pippa Strickland|Lindsay Heesom|Carolyn Burgess-Johansson|Amanda Neubauer|Talitha Best|PJ Oaten|Jason Thomas|Carolyn Lam|Madi Green|Robyn Tannhauser|Neil Thompson|Karen Danardi|Simon Varga|Stefan Ammer|Henri Phillips|Daniel Hartley|Suzie Wieszyk|Thomas Helps|Laura Wilkinson|Abdrew Simmons|Ray Smith|Daniel Busch|Jimmy Leiged|Mark Cheway|Mick Wordley|Rob Riley|Richard Tonkin|Lyelle Woodbury|John Hamilton|Terry Christou|Michael Eglezos|Lani John Tupu|Jade Amantea|Lachlan Ward|Phil Austin|Melissa Cropley|Adrian Medhurst|Jasmin Radibratovic|Rebekah Rimington|Isabella Rositano|Andrea Warren|Matt Connelly
title: Broken Hill
